short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simplify recipe websites to show only ingredients and instructions.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simple recipe gets you exactly what you want from recipe sites and blogs, the ingredients and directions without any unnecessary filler. Simply activate the extension and the recipe from the page you are browsing will pop up in a new window, in a plain text and easy to read format.
